casebody.data:
Seivert, Admx., v. Morrison et al.; Deoreo, Appellant.

[Cite as Seivert v. Morrison (1992), 63 Ohio St.3d 1207.]

*1208(No. 91-767 Submitted February 25, 1992 Decided April 8, 1992.) Turner & May, Michael A. Partlow and Lawrence Turner, for appellant.

This cause is dismissed, sua sponte, as having been improvidently allowed.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur. Wright, J., dissents and would affirm the judgment of the court of appeals.
